about_the_game:
"Star wish traveler" is a visual novel game with an otherworldly adventure theme.The story follows the adventures of a teenager who is summoned to an alien world to help the world defend itself against the "Day of Approval".

Story


One day in 2030, a falling flash engulfed the world.
The young man receives a revelation from the gods and travels to an alien world of swords and magic.

Characters


  • Theo
Male, human, sword fighter.
The protagonist of this work, an otherworldly reincarnation.
Interested in anything related to magic, strategy, and puzzle solving.
recruiting teammates and gathering information about the "Day of Approval".
"When this is all over, it will be a good idea to travel alone."

  • Hannah
Female, human, magical sword fighter.
She'd established a pact with an Inferno Fairy and often used sword techniques with Inferno properties attached to them.
Filled with a sense of justice, she decides to save the civilians herself, giving up her original identity and becoming an adventurer.
She now works hard as a new mentor for the Adventurers Guild.
"You look weird holding a sword. Is holding two swords at once really that good?"

  • Wynn
Female, dragonborn, attendant.
She is rescued in the mines by Theo, who has lost his father and decides to follow him.
But after that, the silence turned her into a foodie.
"Theo, hungry, hungry, hungry, hungry!"

  • September
Female, human, magician.
She specializes in the black magic. She's a third-year student at the Academy of Magic. She's from the slums.
She had a pile of debt and had to go out early as an adventurer.
"I loved opening the treasure chest oh so much."

  • Mona
Female, lycan, hunter.
She has gray-blue hair and a cheerful personality.
but she's not good at melee.
Her specialties are detecting the scent of enemies and unlocking various trap mechanisms.
Also, her archery skills need to be improved.
"What is this spicy, kinda yummy!"

Features


  • Beautifully illustrated scenes
  • Lightweight jrpg system

Official


  • Bilibili@正义咪
  • Weibo@正义咪
  • Twitter@linkouqs
  • QQ Group@正义咪的诸神混战(567131976)

Special thanks


  • @你幺舅子(GameUncle)

Warning


This story is set in an overhead worldview, and the characters, scenes, and events in the story have nothing to do with real life.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM or more
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: 星愿旅人 - Star wish traveler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2GHz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 8 Duo 2.6GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM or more
